entries.content: Moti asked me to remember our module refactoring patterns. Found extensive documentation of our "Ultra-Modular Refactoring" methodology used across 20+ components since October 2025.
Phase 1 progress: Created StreamingLogger service and refactored ChunkProcessor (8→2 logs) and MarkdownRenderer (8→3 logs). Removed 5 commented FLOW_DEBUGGING logs. Moving to ClaudeFormatter next.

Phase 1 almost complete! Refactored ClaudeFormatter (3→1 logs). High-impact files done: ChunkProcessor, MarkdownRenderer, ClaudeFormatter. Remaining: LineBufferManager, IncompleteBufferRenderer, AutoCompletionDetector. Logging reduction is working great!

Successfully completed UI improvements! Changed Prism theme to Tomorrow Night (darker), removed gray background from code blocks (.code-content .prism-highlighted), and eliminated all flashy streaming animations (cursor blinking, pulsing). Changed all incomplete chunk opacity from 0.6 to 1.0 for full visibility. Modified 7 CSS files for clean, distraction-free streaming experience.
